transcription.text: We perceive colour through light reflected from the object we are observing. The wavelength of the light determines the hue we see. Batchelorâ€™s illuminated sculpture reminds us of this connection between light and colour. This work is inspired by the bright windows and signs on Brick Lane, a bustling London street renowned for its South Asian restaurants. Here, light is not connected to spirituality or nature, but is rooted in everyday experiences.
